data.name: Agent of Masks
data.oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
data.flavor_text: "Two-faced" is an understatement.

data.name: Alms Beast
data.oracle_text: Creatures blocking or blocked by Alms Beast have lifelink.
data.flavor_text: Alms-coins are only redeemable at Orzhov businesses.

data.name: Angel of Despair
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Angel of Despair enters the battlefield, destroy target permanent.
data.flavor_text:
"I feel in them a sense of duty and commitment, yet I can feel nothing else. It is as if their duty is to an empty void."
—Razia, Boros archangel

data.name: Anguished Unmaking
data.oracle_text: Exile target nonland permanent. You lose 3 life.
data.flavor_text: Sorin had created Avacyn, so it was a cruelty beyond imagining, a pain beyond description, that it fell upon him to end her forever.

data.name: Arvad the Cursed
data.oracle_text:
Deathtouch, lifelink
Other legendary creatures you control get +2/+2.
data.flavor_text: "I won't abandon the *Weatherlight*. My destiny is to serve at Jhoira's side. This 'illness' means I must trust my faith more and myself less."

data.name: Aryel, Knight of Windgrace
data.oracle_text:
Vigilance
{2}{W}, {T}: Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.
{B}, {T}, Tap X untapped Knights you control: Destroy target creature with power X or less.

data.name: Ascent of the Worthy
data.oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I, II — Choose a creature you control. Until your next turn, all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control is dealt to that creature instead.
III — Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a flying counter on it. That creature is an Angel Warrior in addition to its other types.

data.name: Ashen Rider
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Ashen Rider enters the battlefield or dies, exile target permanent.
data.flavor_text: One offering to appease her on her arrival. Another to celebrate her departure.

data.name: Ass Whuppin'
data.oracle_text: Destroy target silver-bordered permanent in any game you can see from your seat.
data.flavor_text: Asses to ashes, Donkeys to dust.

data.name: Athreos, God of Passage
data.oracle_text:
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to white and black is less than seven, Athreos isn't a creature.
Whenever another creature you own dies, return it to your hand unless target opponent pays 3 life.

data.name: Athreos, Shroud-Veiled
data.oracle_text:
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to white and black is less than seven, Athreos isn't a creature.
At the beginning of your end step, put a coin counter on another target creature.
Whenever a creature with a coin counter on it dies or is put into exile, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

data.name: Ayli, Eternal Pilgrim
data.oracle_text:
Deathtouch
{1}, Sacrifice another creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.
{1}{W}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Exile target nonland permanent. Activate only if you have at least 10 life more than your starting life total.

data.name: Barrowin of Clan Undurr
data.oracle_text:
When Barrowin of Clan Undurr enters the battlefield, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
Whenever Barrowin of Clan Undurr attacks, return up to one creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield if you've completed a dungeon.

data.name: Basilica Bell-Haunt
data.oracle_text: When Basilica Bell-Haunt enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card and you gain 3 life.
data.flavor_text: You can hear their tolling only when your debt is due.

data.name: Batwing Brume
data.oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn if {W} was spent to cast this spell. Each player loses 1 life for each attacking creature they control if {B} was spent to cast this spell. (Do both if {W}{B} was spent.)

data.name: Beckon Apparition
data.oracle_text: Exile target card from a graveyard. Create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.
data.flavor_text: The foyer is littered with the coins it demands but can no longer hold.

data.name: Blind Hunter
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.)
When Blind Hunter enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

data.name: Blood Baron of Vizkopa
data.oracle_text:
Lifelink, protection from white and from black
As long as you have 30 or more life and an opponent has 10 or less life, Blood Baron of Vizkopa gets +6/+6 and has flying.

data.name: Blood-Cursed Knight
data.oracle_text: As long as you control an enchantment, Blood-Cursed Knight gets +1/+1 and has lifelink. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
data.flavor_text: "The bloodlust shall not control me, for my oath is my greatest compulsion."

data.name: Bloodied Ghost
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Bloodied Ghost enters the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.
data.flavor_text:
"Only a knife left for a fortnight in the hollow of a ghastbark tree can inflict a wound so grave."
—Kithkin superstition

data.name: Blot Out the Sky
data.oracle_text: Create X tapped 2/1 white and black Inkling creature tokens with flying. If X is 6 or more, destroy all noncreature, nonland permanents.
data.flavor_text: A drop of ink is a nuisance. A torrent of inklings is a menace.

data.name: Breathless Knight
data.oracle_text:
Flying, lifelink
Whenever Breathless Knight or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature entered from a graveyard or you cast it from a graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Breathless Knight.
data.flavor_text: A deadly charge in eerie silence.

data.name: Breena, the Demagogue
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever a player attacks one of your opponents, if that opponent has more life than another of your opponents, that attacking player draws a card and you put two +1/+1 counters on a creature you control.

data.name: Call to the Feast
data.oracle_text: Create three 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink.
data.flavor_text: By the law of church and crown, vampires feed only on the blood of the guilty—those declared heretics, rebels, or enemies of war.

data.name: Campaign of Vengeance
data.oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, defending player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
data.flavor_text:
"There is no saving this world, not anymore. But we shall be its bloody vengeance."
—Sorin Markov

data.name: Can't Stay Away
data.oracle_text:
Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains "If this creature would die, exile it instead."
Flashback {3}{W}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
data.flavor_text: Death is no impediment to dinner.

data.name: Cartel Aristocrat
data.oracle_text: Sacrifice another creature: Cartel Aristocrat gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "Your life serves a higher purpose now: ensuring the continuation of my own."

data.name: Castigate
data.oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card.
data.flavor_text:
"We have no need for military might. We wield two of the sharpest swords ever forged: Faith in our left hand, Wealth in our right."
—Vuliev of the Ghost Council

data.name: Cauldron Haze
data.oracle_text: Choose any number of target creatures. Each of those creatures gains persist until end of turn. (When it dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

data.name: Chief of the Edge
data.oracle_text: Other Warrior creatures you control get +1/+0.
data.flavor_text: "We are the swift, the strong, the blade's sharp shriek! Fear nothing, and strike!"

data.name: Chief of the Scale
data.oracle_text: Other Warrior creatures you control get +0/+1.
data.flavor_text: "We are the shield unbroken. If we fall today, we will die well, and our trees will bear our names in honor."

data.name: Circle of Despair
data.oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to any target this turn, prevent that damage.
data.flavor_text:
"Life is a resource that should belong only to the strong."
—Shauku, Endbringer

data.name: Cleric of Life's Bond
data.oracle_text:
Whenever another Cleric enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
Whenever you gain life for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Cleric of Life's Bond.
data.flavor_text: "No gods. Only each other."

data.name: Cliffhaven Vampire
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.
data.flavor_text: "My people are no longer slaves to the Eldrazi, beholden to the past. We will determine our own future."

data.name: Closing Statement
data.oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast during your end step.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker you don't control. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.
data.flavor_text: "In conclusion . . ."

data.name: Conjurer's Ban
data.oracle_text:
Choose a card name. Until your next turn, spells with the chosen name can't be cast and lands with the chosen name can't be played.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: Orzhov faithful file past to have their minds purged of "impure" desires. There, the guiltwardens eliminate any thoughts of hope or self-sufficiency.

card_faces.name: Consecrate
card_faces.oracle_text:
Exile target card from a graveyard.
Draw a card.

card_faces.name: Consume
card_faces.oracle_text: Target player sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures they control. You gain life equal to its power.

data.name: Corpse Knight
data.oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life.
data.flavor_text:
"With each knight that rode out from the bone-white keep, the queen's soldiers felt their courage failing."
—Krinnea, *Siege of the Bone Spire*

data.name: Cruel Celebrant
data.oracle_text: Whenever Cruel Celebrant or another creature or planeswalker you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
data.flavor_text: "Whichever side wins, I'm sure the banquet will be superb."

data.name: Culling Sun
data.oracle_text: Destroy each creature with mana value 3 or less.
data.flavor_text:
"Who truly runs this city? Look to the sky on hallowed days, and see whose sigil is stamped clearly onto the heavens."
—Vuliev of the Ghost Council

data.name: Daxos the Returned
data.oracle_text:
Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you get an experience counter.
{1}{W}{B}: Create a white and black Spirit enchantment creature token. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of experience counters you have."

data.name: Deathbringer Liege
data.oracle_text:
Other white creatures you control get +1/+1.
Other black creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever you cast a white spell, you may tap target creature.
Whenever you cast a black spell, you may destroy target creature if it's tapped.

data.name: Death Grasp
data.oracle_text: Death Grasp deals X damage to any target. You gain X life.
data.flavor_text: Plate mail, the skin of the chest, the rib cage, the heart—all useless against the mage who can reach directly for the soul.

data.name: Deathpact Angel
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Deathpact Angel dies, create a 1/1 white and black Cleric creature token. It has "{3}{W}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Return a card named Deathpact Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield."

data.name: Debtors' Knell
data.oracle_text:
({W/B} can be paid with either {W} or {B}.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
data.flavor_text: One moment, conscious only of a sense of repose. The next moment, hearing the trudge of his own footsteps. He sighed and squinted into the glare ahead.

data.name: Debt to the Deathless
data.oracle_text: Each opponent loses two times X life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
data.flavor_text: Some of Orzhov's cruelest collectors remember their debtors by taste alone.

data.name: Despark
data.oracle_text: Exile target permanent with mana value 4 or greater.
data.flavor_text: Liliana whispered to whatever consciousness Oketra and Bontu had left. "You are the gods. He is the usurper. You know what to do."

data.name: Dire Tactics
data.oracle_text: Exile target creature. If you don't control a Human, you lose life equal to that creature's toughness.
data.flavor_text:
"I will preserve human life at all costs. I will stand alone against behemoths before I let them touch my city. I will hold the wall."
—Oath of the Coppercoats

data.name: Divinity of Pride
data.oracle_text:
Flying, lifelink
Divinity of Pride gets +4/+4 as long as you have 25 or more life.
data.flavor_text:
"She spoke of mystery and portent, of such unfathomable things that my mind screamed for pity."
—*The Seer's Parables*

data.name: Doom Foretold
data.oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a nonland, nontoken permanent. If that player can't, they discard a card, they lose 2 life, you draw a card, you gain 2 life, you create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance, then you sacrifice Doom Foretold.
data.flavor_text: In the end, death usually has its way.

data.name: Dramatic Finale
data.oracle_text:
Creature tokens you control get +1/+1.
Whenever one or more nontoken creatures you control die, create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying. This ability triggers only once each turn.
data.flavor_text: The enraptured audience barely noticed their programs were suddenly blank.

data.name: Drana's Emissary
data.oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
data.flavor_text: "The taste of freedom is sweeter than blood."

data.name: Edgar, Charmed Groom // Edgar Markov's Coffin
data.type_line: Legendary Creature — Vampire Noble // Legendary Artifact

card_faces.name: Edgar, Charmed Groom
card_faces.oracle_text:
Other Vampires you control get +1/+1.
When Edgar, Charmed Groom dies, return it to the battlefield transformed under its owner's control.
card_faces.flavor_text: "Our kind has taken my gift for granted. It is time to correct that folly."

card_faces.name: Edgar Markov's Coffin
card_faces.oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 white and black Vampire creature token with lifelink and put a bloodline counter on Edgar Markov's Coffin. Then if there are three or more bloodline counters on it, remove those counters and transform it.

all_parts.name: Edgar, Charmed Groom // Edgar Markov's Coffin
all_parts.type_line: Legendary Creature — Vampire Noble // Legendary Artifact

data.name: Edge of the Divinity
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
As long as enchanted creature is white, it gets +1/+2.
As long as enchanted creature is black, it gets +2/+1.
data.flavor_text: The divinity's patronage confers both wicked grace and graceful wickedness.

data.name: Edgewalker
data.oracle_text: Cleric spells you cast cost {W}{B} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay. (For example, if you cast a Cleric spell with mana cost {1}{W}, it costs {1} to cast.)

data.name: Elenda, the Dusk Rose
data.oracle_text:
Lifelink
Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Elenda, the Dusk Rose.
When Elenda dies, create X 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink, where X is Elenda's power.
data.flavor_text: Her centuries-long search is ended.

data.name: Etchings of the Chosen
data.oracle_text:
As Etchings of the Chosen enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.
{1}, Sacrifice a creature of the chosen type: Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn.

data.name: Ethereal Absolution
data.oracle_text:
Creatures you control get +1/+1.
Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1.
{2}{W}{B}: Exile target card from an opponent's graveyard. If it was a creature card, you create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.
data.flavor_text:
"Time to let the dead be dead."
—Kaya, to Teysa

data.name: Evershrike
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Evershrike gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it.
{X}{W/B}{W/B}: Return Evershrike from your graveyard to the battlefield. You may put an Aura card with mana value X or less from your hand onto the battlefield attached to it. If you don't, exile Evershrike.

data.name: Executioner's Swing
data.oracle_text: Target creature that dealt damage this turn gets -5/-5 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "The contract specified an appendage for a missed payment. Read the fine print: the head is an appendage."

data.name: Exhilarating Elocution
data.oracle_text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. Other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: His words poured forth on waves of golden light, scouring all fear from his audience's hearts and minds.

data.name: Extus, Oriq Overlord // Awaken the Blood Avatar

card_faces.name: Extus, Oriq Overlord
card_faces.oracle_text:
Double strike
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, return target nonlegendary creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
card_faces.flavor_text: "Join me for the dawn of a new age."

card_faces.name: Awaken the Blood Avatar
card_faces.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each creature sacrificed this way.
Each opponent sacrifices a creature. Create a 3/6 black and red Avatar creature token with haste and "Whenever this creature attacks, it deals 3 damage to each opponent."

all_parts.name: Extus, Oriq Overlord // Awaken the Blood Avatar

data.name: Felisa, Fang of Silverquill
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, if it had counters on it, create X tapped 2/1 white and black Inkling creature tokens with flying, where X is the number of counters it had on it.

data.name: Final Payment
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay 5 life or sacrifice a creature or enchantment.
Destroy target creature.
data.flavor_text: There's nothing quite like the feeling of paying off a large debt.

data.name: Firja, Judge of Valor
data.oracle_text:
Flying, lifelink
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
data.flavor_text: She is both shepherd and reaper, and her judgment is final.

data.name: Firja's Retribution
data.oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Create a 4/4 white Angel Warrior creature token with flying and vigilance.
II — Until end of turn, Angels you control gain "{T}: Destroy target creature with power less than this creature's power."
III — Angels you control gain double strike until end of turn.

data.name: Fleshtaker
data.oracle_text:
Whenever you sacrifice another creature, you gain 1 life and scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{1}, Sacrifice another creature: Fleshtaker gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: A soulless husk of endless hunger.

data.name: Fracture
data.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or planeswalker.
data.flavor_text:
"Your defiance is amusing, little mage. It's time you learn how fragile you really are."
—Extus Narr

data.name: General Kudro of Drannith
data.oracle_text:
Other Humans you control get +1/+1.
Whenever General Kudro of Drannith or another Human enters the battlefield under your control, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard.
{2}, Sacrifice two Humans: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

data.name: General's Enforcer
data.oracle_text:
Legendary Humans you control have indestructible.
{2}{W}{B}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.
data.flavor_text: More stubborn than Drannith's walls.

data.name: Gerrard's Verdict
data.oracle_text: Target player discards two cards. You gain 3 life for each land card discarded this way.
data.flavor_text: A heart of light and a soul of darkness cannot coexist.

data.name: Ghost Council of Orzhova
data.oracle_text:
When Ghost Council of Orzhova enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
{1}, Sacrifice a creature: Exile Ghost Council of Orzhova. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

data.name: Gift of Orzhova
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying and lifelink.
data.flavor_text:
"Remember by whose gift you ascend."
—Milana, Orzhov prelate

data.name: Graceful Restoration
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
• Return up to two target creature cards with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

data.name: Grasping Thrull
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Grasping Thrull enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life.
data.flavor_text: "Debt due! Debt due!" The thrull's screeching makes children flinch and debtors quail. "Debt due!"

card_faces.name: Grind
card_faces.oracle_text: Put a -1/-1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.

card_faces.name: Dust
card_faces.oracle_text:
Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.)
Exile any number of target creatures that have -1/-1 counters on them.

data.name: Gwyllion Hedge-Mage
data.oracle_text:
When Gwyllion Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Plains, you may create a 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature token.
When Gwyllion Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Swamps, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

data.name: Harsh Sustenance
data.oracle_text: Harsh Sustenance deals X damage to any target and you gain X life, where X is the number of creatures you control.
data.flavor_text: The Shifting Wastes provide refuge to those who know where to look for it.

data.name: Harvest Gwyllion
data.oracle_text: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
data.flavor_text: She speaks only in vile epithets, spitting out curses and obscenities that harm others just by the hearing.

data.name: Hidden Stockpile
data.oracle_text:
Revolt — At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
{1}, Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1.

data.name: High Priest of Penance
data.oracle_text: Whenever High Priest of Penance is dealt damage, you may destroy target nonland permanent.
data.flavor_text: "All I require is faith, loyalty, obedience, trust, and complete and utter devotion."

data.name: Humiliate
data.oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control.
data.flavor_text: "Aw, what's that? No comeback?"

data.name: Identity Crisis
data.oracle_text: Exile all cards from target player's hand and graveyard.
data.flavor_text:
"To join our ranks, one must be pure. To be pure, one must be blessed by etherium. To be blessed, one must forget oneself."
—Ethersworn prayer

data.name: Immortal Servitude
data.oracle_text: Return each creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield.
data.flavor_text:
"The fine print of countless contracts has ensured we are never defenseless."
—Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov

data.name: Imperious Oligarch
data.oracle_text:
Vigilance
Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)
data.flavor_text: The rights of ghosts are strictly protected under Orzhov bylaws, and those who enforce them can count on the ghosts' assistance.

data.name: Indulging Patrician
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, each opponent loses 3 life.
data.flavor_text: "Just a nibble for now. I wouldn't want to ruin my appetite."

data.name: Inkling Summoning
data.oracle_text: Create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying.
data.flavor_text:
"Think of an insult so vicious, so vulgar, that you hesitate to speak it aloud. The strongest, most aggressive inklings are born from such scorn."
—Embrose, Silverquill dean

data.name: Inkshield
data.oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn. For each 1 damage prevented this way, create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying.
data.flavor_text: Silverquill's elite know how to offer a scathing rebuttal without uttering a word.

data.name: Kambal, Consul of Allocation
data.oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
data.flavor_text: He has "friends" in places both high and low, and all seem to owe him favors.

data.name: Karlov of the Ghost Council
data.oracle_text:
Whenever you gain life, put two +1/+1 counters on Karlov of the Ghost Council.
{W}{B}, Remove six +1/+1 counters from Karlov of the Ghost Council: Exile target creature.
data.flavor_text: "Does Teysa think me blind to her scheming? Ambition runs in our family."

data.name: Kaya, Bane of the Dead
data.oracle_text:
Your opponents and permanents your opponents control with hexproof can be the targets of spells and abilities you control as though they didn't have hexproof.
−3: Exile target creature.

data.name: Kaya, Geist Hunter
data.oracle_text:
+1: Creatures you control gain deathtouch until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature token you control.
−2: Until end of turn, if one or more tokens would be created under your control, twice that many of those tokens are created instead.
−6: Exile all cards from all graveyards, then create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying for each card exiled this way.

data.name: Kaya, Ghost Assassin
data.oracle_text:
0: Exile Kaya, Ghost Assassin or up to one target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep. You lose 2 life.
−1: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
−2: Each opponent discards a card and you draw a card.

data.name: Kaya, Orzhov Usurper
data.oracle_text:
+1: Exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard. You gain 2 life if at least one creature card was exiled this way.
−1: Exile target nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less.
−5: Kaya, Orzhov Usurper deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards that player owns in exile and you gain that much life.

data.name: Kaya's Guile
data.oracle_text:
Choose two —
• Each opponent sacrifices a creature.
• Exile all opponents' graveyards.
• Create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.
• You gain 4 life.
Entwine {3} (Choose all if you pay the entwine cost.)

data.name: Kaya's Wrath
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. You gain life equal to the number of creatures you controlled that were destroyed this way.
data.flavor_text: Teysa convened the meeting of the Obzedat. Kaya ended it.

data.name: Kaya the Inexorable
data.oracle_text:
+1: Put a ghostform counter on up to one target nontoken creature. It gains "When this creature dies or is put into exile, return it to its owner's hand and create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying."
−3: Exile target nonland permanent.
−7: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may cast a legendary spell from your hand, from your graveyard, or from among cards you own in exile without paying its mana cost."

data.name: Killian, Ink Duelist
data.oracle_text:
Lifelink
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Spells you cast that target a creature cost {2} less to cast.
data.flavor_text: "When your father is Dean Embrose, second best really isn't an option."

data.name: Kingpin's Pet
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
data.flavor_text:
"Debt and death sound so similar, and thrulls are so hard of hearing. Mistakes are inevitable."
—Milana, Orzhov prelate

data.name: Knight of the Last Breath
data.oracle_text:
{3}, Sacrifice another nontoken creature: Create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.
Afterlife 3 (When this creature dies, create three 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)

data.name: Knights' Charge
data.oracle_text:
Whenever a Knight you control attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
{6}{W}{B}, Sacrifice Knights' Charge: Return all Knight creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
data.flavor_text:
"By hoof, wing, or paw. For the realm!"
—Syr Gwyn, Hero of Ashvale

data.name: Knights of the Black Rose
data.oracle_text:
When Knights of the Black Rose enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
Whenever an opponent becomes the monarch, if you were the monarch as the turn began, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
data.flavor_text: "Hail to the true queen! Long may she reign!"

data.name: Kunoros, Hound of Athreos
data.oracle_text:
Vigilance, menace, lifelink
Creature cards in graveyards can't enter the battlefield.
Players can't cast spells from graveyards.
data.flavor_text: Three sharp barks announce an attempt to escape the Underworld. Three sharp bites end it.

data.name: Legion Lieutenant
data.oracle_text: Other Vampires you control get +1/+1.
data.flavor_text: "We long ago abandoned the things that make humans weak: friendship, marriage, family. All that remains is the strength of our devotion."

data.name: Liesa, Forgotten Archangel
data.oracle_text:
Flying, lifelink
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, return that card to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.
If a creature an opponent controls would die, exile it instead.

data.name: Liesa, Shroud of Dusk
data.oracle_text:
Rather than pay {2} for each previous time you've cast this spell from the command zone this game, pay 2 life that many times.
Flying, lifelink
Whenever a player casts a spell, they lose 2 life.

data.name: Lurrus of the Dream-Den
data.oracle_text:
Companion — Each permanent card in your starting deck has mana value 2 or less. (If this card is your chosen companion, you may put it into your hand from outside the game for {3} any time you could cast a sorcery.)
Lifelink
During each of your turns, you may cast one permanent spell with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard.

data.name: Magister of Worth
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Will of the council — When Magister of Worth enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for grace or condemnation. If grace gets more votes, each player returns each creature card from their graveyard to the battlefield. If condemnation gets more votes or the vote is tied, destroy all creatures other than Magister of Worth.

data.name: March from the Tomb
data.oracle_text: Return any number of target Ally creature cards with total mana value 8 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
data.flavor_text: They came from all walks of life, from every part of Zendikar, and they returned with one unifying cause.

data.name: Markov Purifier
data.oracle_text:
Lifelink
At the beginning of your end step, if you gained life this turn, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.
data.flavor_text: The ceremonial "incense" was a concoction of Edgar's own design, a precise blend of blood from his favorite human lineages.

data.name: Martyrs' Tomb
data.oracle_text: Pay 2 life: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
data.flavor_text:
Honor the brave who fought,
Honor the dead who fell,
Honor the world they saved.
—Memorial inscription

data.name: Maw of the Obzedat
data.oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: The devout sacrifice themselves to it hoping for escape from their debts to the guild, but many end up owing in the afterlife.

data.name: Merciless Eviction
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Exile all artifacts.
• Exile all creatures.
• Exile all enchantments.
• Exile all planeswalkers.

data.name: Mortify
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature or enchantment.
data.flavor_text:
"Your debt is erased."
—Hilgur, Orzhov euthanist

data.name: Mourning Thrull
data.oracle_text:
({W/B} can be paid with either {W} or {B}.)
Flying
Whenever Mourning Thrull deals damage, you gain that much life.
data.flavor_text: During their ascent to spirithood, patriarchs of Orzhova shed both flesh and emotion. This earthly slag is collected and formed into thrulls.

data.name: Necromancer's Covenant
data.oracle_text:
When Necromancer's Covenant enters the battlefield, exile all creature cards from target player's graveyard, then create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each card exiled this way.
Zombies you control have lifelink.

data.name: Necropanther
data.oracle_text:
Mutate {2}{W/B}{W/B} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Whenever this creature mutates, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

data.name: Necrotic Sliver
data.oracle_text: All Slivers have "{3}, Sacrifice this permanent: Destroy target permanent."
data.flavor_text: Though Volrath is long dead, the slivers have become everything he wanted them to be: mindless instruments of destruction and despair.

card_faces.name: Night
card_faces.oracle_text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card_faces.name: Day
card_faces.oracle_text: Creatures target player controls get +1/+1 until end of turn.

data.name: Nightsky Mimic
data.oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell that's both white and black, Nightsky Mimic has base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn and gains flying until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: A mimic need only touch a being to learn its shape, but touching usually leads to mauling and messily eating.

data.name: Nip Gwyllion
data.oracle_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
data.flavor_text: Once your life and all your worldly possessions have been surrendered to her, a gwyllion can be surprisingly civilized.

data.name: Oath of Kaya
data.oracle_text:
When Oath of Kaya enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
Whenever an opponent attacks a planeswalker you control with one or more creatures, Oath of Kaya deals 2 damage to that player and you gain 2 life.
data.flavor_text: "So everyone gets what they truly deserve, I will keep watch."

data.name: Obzedat, Ghost Council
data.oracle_text:
When Obzedat, Ghost Council enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
At the beginning of your end step, you may exile Obzedat. If you do, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep. It gains haste.

data.name: Obzedat's Aid
data.oracle_text: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
data.flavor_text:
"The Obzedat have revived you with purpose. Don't squander their blessing."
—Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov

data.name: One Thousand Lashes
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 1 life.

data.name: Orah, Skyclave Hierophant
data.oracle_text:
Lifelink
Whenever Orah, Skyclave Hierophant or another Cleric you control dies, return target Cleric card with lesser mana value from your graveyard to the battlefield.
data.flavor_text: "The Skyclaves are our inheritance."

data.name: Orzhov Charm
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Return target creature you control and all Auras you control attached to it to their owner's hand.
• Destroy target creature and you lose life equal to its toughness.
• Return target creature card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

data.name: Orzhov Guildmage
data.oracle_text:
{2}{W}: Target player gains 1 life.
{2}{B}: Each player loses 1 life.

data.name: Orzhov Pontiff
data.oracle_text:
Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.)
When Orzhov Pontiff enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, choose one —
• Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
• Creatures you don't control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

data.name: Owlin Shieldmage
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Ward—Pay 3 life. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 3 life.)
data.flavor_text: "Aim higher next time."

data.name: Pillory of the Sleepless
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life."
data.flavor_text: Which is worse—the sleep which never ends or that which never comes?

data.name: Pitiless Pontiff
data.oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Pitiless Pontiff gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
data.flavor_text: "Pay in gold. Pay in blood. Pay with the servitude of your spirit kin. But pay you must."

data.name: Priest of Fell Rites
data.oracle_text:
{T}, Pay 3 life, Sacrifice Priest of Fell Rites: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.
Unearth {3}{W}{B} ({3}{W}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

data.name: Primevals' Glorious Rebirth
data.oracle_text:
(You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)
Return all legendary permanent cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
data.flavor_text: Centuries ago, five dragons conquered death to rule the living.

data.name: Profane Procession // Tomb of the Dusk Rose

card_faces.name: Profane Procession
card_faces.oracle_text: {3}{W}{B}: Exile target creature. Then if there are three or more cards exiled with Profane Procession, transform it.
card_faces.flavor_text: Vona sought a conqueror. Mavren sought a savior. Both found what they sought . . .

card_faces.name: Tomb of the Dusk Rose
card_faces.oracle_text:
(Transforms from Profane Procession.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{2}{W}{B}, {T}: Put a creature card exiled with this permanent onto the battlefield under your control.
card_faces.flavor_text: . . . resting in the splendor of the dead.

card_faces.name: Profit
card_faces.oracle_text:
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

card_faces.name: Loss
card_faces.oracle_text:
Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

data.name: Purgatory
data.oracle_text:
Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, exile that card.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {4} and 2 life. If you do, return a card exiled with Purgatory to the battlefield.

data.name: Purge the Profane
data.oracle_text: Target opponent discards two cards and you gain 2 life.
data.flavor_text: The Orzhov hear the plans of the other guilds through the guilty thoughts of the disloyal.

data.name: Putrid Warrior
data.oracle_text:
Whenever Putrid Warrior deals damage, choose one —
• Each player loses 1 life.
• Each player gains 1 life.
data.flavor_text: "I do not like it," said Grizzlegom, "but I will take every soldier I can get."

data.name: Pyrrhic Revival
data.oracle_text: Each player returns each creature card from their graveyard to the battlefield with an additional -1/-1 counter on it.
data.flavor_text: They found themselves alive again, still bearing their mortal wounds.

data.name: Rampage of the Valkyries
data.oracle_text:
When Rampage of the Valkyries enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying and vigilance.
Whenever an Angel you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.
data.flavor_text: "This is a foul place. Cleanse it."

data.name: Ravos, Soultender
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Other creatures you control get +1/+1.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

data.name: Regal Bloodlord
data.oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of each end step, if you gained life this turn, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying.
data.flavor_text: Those of esteemed birth earn a most esteemed death.

data.name: Resolute Rider
data.oracle_text:
{W/B}{W/B}: Resolute Rider gains lifelink until end of turn.
{W/B}{W/B}{W/B}: Resolute Rider gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
data.flavor_text: "Respect the wilds? Certainly. Fear them? No."

data.name: Restless Apparition
data.oracle_text:
{W/B}{W/B}{W/B}: Restless Apparition gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

data.name: Restoration Gearsmith
data.oracle_text: When Restoration Gearsmith enters the battlefield, return target artifact or creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
data.flavor_text: All she touches turns to well-oiled, delicately calibrated, perfectly balanced gold.

card_faces.name: Revival
card_faces.oracle_text: Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card_faces.name: Revenge
card_faces.oracle_text: Double your life total. Target opponent loses half their life, rounded up.

data.name: Righteous War
data.oracle_text:
White creatures you control have protection from black.
Black creatures you control have protection from white.
data.flavor_text:
"This is a war without neutrality."
—Asmira, Holy Avenger

data.name: Rise of Extus
data.oracle_text:
Exile target creature. Exile up to one target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: With one lethal strike, Extus took control of the Oriq and took his first step towards vengeance.

data.name: Rise to Glory
data.oracle_text:
Choose one or both —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• Return target Aura card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
data.flavor_text: A hero dies, and a legend arises.

data.name: Rite of Oblivion
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a nonland permanent.
Exile target nonland permanent.
Flashback {2}{W}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost and any additional costs. Then exile it.)
data.flavor_text: Revenge is a circle without end.

data.name: Selenia, Dark Angel
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Pay 2 life: Return Selenia, Dark Angel to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text: "I am light. I am dark. I must give my life to serve; not even death can release me."

data.name: Sentry of the Underworld
data.oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance
{W}{B}, Pay 3 life: Regenerate Sentry of the Underworld.
data.flavor_text: When Athreos gathers the newly dead to be ferried across the Five Rivers That Ring the World, he sends skeletal griffins to fetch those who stray.

data.name: Seraph of the Scales
data.oracle_text:
Flying
{W}: Seraph of the Scales gains vigilance until end of turn.
{B}: Seraph of the Scales gains deathtouch until end of turn.
Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)

data.name: Shadewing Laureate
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever another creature you control with flying dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
data.flavor_text: "Would you prefer I destroy you using prose or verse?"

data.name: Shadrix Silverquill
data.oracle_text:
Flying, double strike
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may choose two. Each mode must target a different player.
• Target player creates a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying.
• Target player draws a card and loses 1 life.
• Target player puts a +1/+1 counter on each creature they control.

data.name: Silverquill Apprentice
data.oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: She had spoken the words a hundred times, but under the spotlight, in front of everyone, something new emerged. And the crowd went wild.

data.name: Silverquill Command
data.oracle_text:
Choose two —
• Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.
• Return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• Target player draws a card and loses 1 life.
• Target opponent sacrifices a creature.

data.name: Silverquill Pledgemage
data.oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Silverquill Pledgemage gains your choice of flying or lifelink until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "I avoid violence. It is the last resort of the witless. But if you insist, I'll make an exception for you."

data.name: Silverquill Silencer
data.oracle_text:
As Silverquill Silencer enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name.
Whenever an opponent casts a spell with the chosen name, they lose 3 life and you draw a card.
data.flavor_text: "I am very much in the mood to start handing out expulsions."

data.name: Sin Collector
data.oracle_text: When Sin Collector enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it and exile that card.
data.flavor_text: "That must weigh heavily on your soul. Let me purge it for you."

data.name: Sorin, Grim Nemesis
data.oracle_text:
+1: Reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. Each opponent loses life equal to its mana value.
−X: Sorin, Grim Nemesis deals X damage to target creature or planeswalker and you gain X life.
−9: Create a number of 1/1 black Vampire Knight creature tokens with lifelink equal to the highest life total among all players.

data.name: Sorin, Lord of Innistrad
data.oracle_text:
+1: Create a 1/1 black Vampire creature token with lifelink.
−2: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +1/+0."
−6: Destroy up to three target creatures and/or other planeswalkers. Return each card put into a graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control.

data.name: Sorin, Solemn Visitor
data.oracle_text:
+1: Until your next turn, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain lifelink.
−2: Create a 2/2 black Vampire creature token with flying.
−6: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature."

data.name: Sorin, Vengeful Bloodlord
data.oracle_text:
As long as it's your turn, creatures and planeswalkers you control have lifelink.
+2: Sorin, Vengeful Bloodlord deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
−X: Return target creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature is a Vampire in addition to its other types.

data.name: Soul Link
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
Whenever enchanted creature is dealt damage, you gain that much life.
data.flavor_text: They danced like puppets to a tune only Yawgmoth could hear.

data.name: Souls of the Faultless
data.oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Souls of the Faultless is dealt combat damage, you gain that much life and attacking player loses that much life.
data.flavor_text:
"More horrible than their empty forms are their noble eyes. I dare not strike."
—Klattic, Boros legionnaire

data.name: Spiteful Squad
data.oracle_text:
Deathtouch
Spiteful Squad enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
When Spiteful Squad dies, put its counters on target creature you control.
data.flavor_text: "Don't you know first-years pay a toll to walk through here?"

card_faces.name: Start
card_faces.oracle_text: Create two 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens with vigilance.

card_faces.name: Finish
card_faces.oracle_text:
Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.)
As an additional cost to cast Finish, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.

data.name: Stillmoon Cavalier
data.oracle_text:
Protection from white and from black
{W/B}: Stillmoon Cavalier gains flying until end of turn.
{W/B}: Stillmoon Cavalier gains first strike until end of turn.
{W/B}{W/B}: Stillmoon Cavalier gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

data.name: Syndicate Guildmage
data.oracle_text:
{1}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature with power 4 or greater.
{4}{B}, {T}: Syndicate Guildmage deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

data.name: Tainted Sigil
data.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Tainted Sigil: You gain life equal to the total life lost by all players this turn. (Damage causes loss of life.)
data.flavor_text: Sigils corrupted by outsiders do not lose their power, only their purity.

data.name: Teysa, Envoy of Ghosts
data.oracle_text:
Vigilance, protection from creatures
Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, destroy that creature. Create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.

data.name: Teysa Karlov
data.oracle_text:
If a creature dying causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.
Creature tokens you control have vigilance and lifelink.
data.flavor_text: While Kaya is guildmaster, Teysa waits patiently at the center of the Orzhov web of power.

data.name: Teysa, Orzhov Scion
data.oracle_text:
Sacrifice three white creatures: Exile target creature.
Whenever another black creature you control dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
